00014 class Solver {
00015 public:
00016         virtual void   solve()  = 0;
00017         virtual Array& getAns() = 0;
00018         virtual Array& getRhs() = 0;    
00019 };

00039 class FPSolver : public Solver {
00040 public:
00041         FPSolver() : alpha(-1.0) {};
00042         ~FPSolver() {};
00043         virtual void setAlpha(double a) { alpha = a; };
00044         double       getAlpha() const { return alpha; };
00045         
00046 protected:
00047         double alpha;
00048 };

00057 class FPSolverCurvatureFFT2D : public FPSolver {
00058 public: 
00059         FPSolverCurvatureFFT2D();

00061         ~FPSolverCurvatureFFT2D();  
00062         
00063         virtual void solve();
00064         virtual Array& getAns();
00065         virtual Array& getRhs();
00066         
00067 protected:
00068         Displacement2D ans;
00069         Displacement2D rhs;
00070         deltaPlan plan;

00086 class FPSolverElasticFFT2D : public FPSolver {
00087 public:
00088         FPSolverElasticFFT2D();
00089         FPSolverElasticFFT2D( const Displacement2D&, double, double, double);
00090         ~FPSolverElasticFFT2D();
00091         
00092         
00093         virtual void setMu(double m) { mu = m; };
00094         double       getMu() const { return mu; };
00095         
00096         virtual void setLambda(double l) { lambda = l; };
00097         double       getLambda() const { return lambda; };
00098         
00099         
00100         virtual void setParameter(double _alpha, double _mu, double _lambda) {
00101                 alpha  = _alpha;
00102                 mu     = _mu;
00103                 lambda = _lambda;
00104         };
00105 
00106         virtual void solve();
00107         virtual Array& getAns();
00108         virtual Array& getRhs();
00109 
00110 protected:
00111         double mu;
00112         double lambda;
00113         Displacement2D ans;
00114         Displacement2D rhs;
00115         elasticPlan plan;
00116         boundary_t bc;
00117         
00118 };

00137 class TMSolver : public Solver {
00138 public:
00139         TMSolver() : alpha(-1.0), tau(-1.0) {};
00140         ~TMSolver() {};
00141         
00142         virtual void setAlpha(double a) { alpha = a; };
00143         double       getAlpha() const { return alpha; };
00144         
00145         virtual void setTau(double t) { tau = t; };
00146         double       getTau() const { return alpha; };
00147         
00148         
00149         virtual void setParameter(double _alpha, double _tau) {
00150                 alpha = _alpha;
00151                 tau = _tau;
00152         };
00153 
00154 protected:
00155         double alpha;
00156         double tau;
00157 };
